definition: a return punch (especially by a boxer), avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing (duties, questions, or issues)
details:
noun
- a return punch (especially by a boxer)
= synonyms: counterpunch
- (fencing) blocking a lunge or deflecting it with a circular motion of the sword
verb
- avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing (duties, questions, or issues)
= synonyms: dodge
- impede the movement of (an opponent or a ball)
= synonyms: block, deflect
